sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Layout, Row, Col, List, Typography } from 'antd' import DetailSlider from '../components/DetailSlider'; const { Text, Title } = Typography const { Content } = Layout const products = [ { id: '1', label: 'Nutella' }, { id: '2', label: 'Pane' }, { id: '3', label: 'Latte' } ]; export const Details = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find(item => item.id === match.params.id); console.log(products, match.params.id) return ( <span style={{ textTransform: 'capitalize' }} >{params.type}</span>,{params.type} in Uzbekistan - prices, photos, online booking

Product ID: {match.params.id}

{product.id} - {product.label}

Back to catalog
) } export default Details
